channel.title: Java is not recognized?
channel.description:
OMG i am using tokkulscape and when i run it sais ,java, is not recognized or something like that! please help!
client: @echo off cd ../files title Running 508 Client java -Xmx256m -cp . client 66 live live software members english game1 pause
server:@echo off cd ../bin color 0a Title NineScape "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\java.exe" Bulby/Server 43594

item.title: Java is not recognized?
item.dc:creator: @dy3p8ntrkid dy3p8ntrkid
item.description:
@dy3p8ntrkid wrote:

I used ninescape before, I can help you with the source, but the client idk.

Make it this. This is what I did to make it work

server:@echo off
cd …/bin
color 0a
Title NineScape
“C:\Program Files \Java\jdk1.6.0_(Your Version)\bin\java.exe” -cp . Bulby/Server 43594

You don’t need the -cp . I believe.

Read full topic

pause

cd …/bin
color 0a
Title NineScape
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\java.exe” Bulby/Server 43594
